name: SprayToon
description:
Spraytoon is a 2d platformer game inspired by the game Splatoon by Nintendo.
The game features local multiplayer for 1 to 4 players. Controls are configured when you start the game, and can be configured to either keyboard or joystick input.
Note: In its current form, configuring input for an analog controller is rather difficult. This will be fixed in a future version.

Disclaimer: Splatoon and its characters are ® of Nintendo.
This game is not affiliated with Nintendo.
